name: Intcode Talker
text:
3+ Cyberse Monsters
Once while face-up on the field (Quick Effect): You can target Cyberse monsters on the field and/or GY up to the number of monsters co-linked to this card; return them to the hand. If a monster this card points to is destroyed by battle or sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Cyberse" monster from your hand.
